name: Musketeer's Dodge
description: You dodge ranged attacks with greater proficiency than most.
prerequisites: Exotic Weapon Proficiency (firearms), gunslinger level 3rd, gunslinger's dodge deed
benefit: When you use the gunslingerâ€™s dodge deed to move, the movement granted by that deed does not provoke attacks of opportunity, and you gain a +4 dodge bonus to your Armor Class.
